testcase.name: GET usuarios busca usuários corretamente

failure.message:
`cy.request()` failed on:
https://auth.padrao-qa2.webpremios.digital/oauth2/userInfo
The response we received from your web server was:
> 400: Bad Request
This was considered a failure because the status code was not `2xx` or `3xx`.
If you do not want status codes to cause failures pass the option: `failOnStatusCode: false`
-----------------------------------------------------------
The request we sent was:
Method: GET URL: https://auth.padrao-qa2.webpremios.digital/oauth2/userInfo Headers: { "Connection": "keep-alive", "user-agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Cypress/9.7.0 Chrome/100.0.4896.75 Electron/18.0.4 Safari/537.36", "accept": "*/*", "accept-encoding": "gzip, deflate" }
-----------------------------------------------------------
The response we got was:
Status: 400 - Bad Request Headers: { "content-type": "application/json;charset=UTF-8", "content-length": "77", "connection": "keep-alive", "date": "Mon, 19 Sep 2022 19:37:41 GMT", "x-amzn-requestid": "39b965b9-6dec-429b-aa0b-2c745adad4e9", "x-xss-protection": "1; mode=block", "strict-transport-security": "max-age=31536000 ; includeSubDomains", "x-amz-cognito-request-id": "21671e06-0c0a-4f2b-b7e0-f3b86e9e733e", "x-frame-options": "DENY", "x-amzn-remapped-connection": "close", "set-cookie": [ "XSRF-TOKEN=d4d3836e-59b4-4298-a258-435d44d914d8; Path=/; Secure; HttpOnly; SameSite=Lax" ], "x-amz-apigw-id": "YuO4bEQ5oAMFssQ=", "cache-control": "no-cache, no-store, max-age=0, must-revalidate", "x-amzn-remapped-server": "Server", "x-content-type-options": "nosniff", "expires": "0", "x-amzn-remapped-www-authenticate": "Bearer realm=https://cognito-idp.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/us-east-1_II8KXhipn, error=INVALID_REQUEST", "x-amzn-trace-id": "Root=1-6328c502-6755ad1a00241663217f2aa4;Sampled=0", "pragma": "no-cache", "x-application-context": "application:prod:8443", "x-amzn-remapped-date": "Mon, 19 Sep 2022 19:37:41 GMT", "x-cache": "Error from cloudfront", "via": "1.1 257bf616e82b7bdb9c0b2562445411f0.cloudfront.net (CloudFront)", "x-amz-cf-pop": "GRU3-C2", "x-amz-cf-id": "M9pn8h-vHOV7yvzzgLh4qUyHk4BH-a-PLCmn8fnDuD7xQkkHqFD6xw==" } Body: { "error": "invalid_request", "error_description": "No authorization header set" }
